players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I find it strange that Bob was the one who got eliminated during the night. Let's keep an eye on Diana and Alice as they might be trying to protect their mafia team member."
Charlie: "I think it's important that we all keep an open mind and consider the possibility that Diana or Alice could be innocent. Let's try to gather more information before making any accusations."
You: "Charlie, you seem very focused on me and Diana specifically. Why are you so certain the mafioso is one of us? That kind of early targeting makes me suspicious of you."
